entities.name: george
entities.description: George is mentioned as having a muffled voice and being squashed against the wall.

entities.name: mr weasley
entities.description: Mr. Weasley is trying to think of what to do and is mentioned as saying 'Boys, boys . . .'

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry retreated to the sofa when Mr. Weasley told him to stand back.

entities.name: uncle vernon
entities.description: Uncle Vernon moved forward and bellowed at the fire.

entities.name: aunt petunia
entities.description: Aunt Petunia shrieked and fell backward over the coffee table.

entities.name: fred
entities.description: Fred is mentioned as having bright red hair.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is mentioned as being expelled from the fireplace along with Mr. Weasley and his brothers.

entities.name: weasleys
entities.description: The Weasleys are mentioned as having bright red hair.

relationships.description: Mr. Weasley told Harry to stand back.
Uncle Vernon bellowed at the fire.
Mr. Weasley was expelled from the fireplace along with his brothers, Fred and George.
